verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came again to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> tell<WH559> the prince<WH5057> of Tyre,<WH6865> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because your heart<WH3820> is lifted up,<WH1361> and you have said,<WH559> I am a god,<WH410> I sit<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of God,<WH430> in the midst<WH3820> of the seas;<WH3220> yet you are man,<WH120> and not God,<WH410> though you set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3820> of God<WH430>—
behold,<WH2450> you are wiser than Daniel;<WH1840> there is no secret<WH5640> that is hidden from you;<WH5640>
by your wisdom<WH2451> and by your understanding<WH8394> you have gotten<WH6213> yourself riches,<WH2428> and have gotten<WH6213> gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> into your treasures;<WH214>
by your great<WH7230> wisdom<WH2451> and by your traffic<WH7404> you have increased<WH7235> your riches,<WH2428> and your heart<WH3824> is lifted up<WH1361> because of your riches<WH2428>—
therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because you have set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3824> of God,<WH430>

therefore,<WH935> behold, I will bring strangers<WH2114> on you,<WH6184> the terrible of the nations;<WH1471> and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against the beauty<WH3308> of your wisdom,<WH2451> and they shall defile<WH2490> your brightness.<WH3314>
They shall bring you down<WH3381> to the pit;<WH7845> and you shall die<WH4191> the death<WH4463> of those who are slain,<WH2491> in the heart<WH3820> of the seas.<WH3220>
Will you yet<WH559> say<WH559> before<WH6440> him who kills<WH2026> you,<WH430> I am God? but you are man,<WH120> and not God,<WH410> in the hand<WH3027> of him who wounds you.<WH2490>
You shall die<WH4191> the death<WH4194> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> by the hand<WH3027> of strangers:<WH2114> for I have spoken<WH1696> it,<WH5002> says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> over the king<WH4428> of Tyre,<WH6865> and tell<WH559> him,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> You seal up<WH2856> the sum,<WH8508> full<WH4392> of wisdom,<WH2451> and perfect<WH3632> in beauty.<WH3308>

You were in Eden,<WH5731> the garden<WH1588> of God;<WH430> every precious<WH3368> stone<WH68> adorned<WH4540> you:<WH124> ruby, topaz,<WH6357> emerald,<WH3095> chrysolite,<WH8658> onyx,<WH7718> jasper,<WH3471> sapphire,<WH5601> turquoise,<WH5306> and beryl.<WH1304> Gold<WH2091> work<WH4399> of tambourines<WH8596> and of pipes<WH5345> was in you.<WH3117> In the day that you were created<WH1254> they were prepared.<WH3559>

You were the anointed<WH4473> cherub<WH3742> who covers:<WH5526> and I set<WH5414> you,<WH6944> so that you were on the holy mountain<WH2022> of God;<WH430> you have walked up and down<WH1980> in the midst<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire.<WH784>
You were perfect<WH8549> in your ways<WH1870> from the day<WH3117> that you were created,<WH1254> until unrighteousness<WH5766> was found in you.<WH4672>

By the abundance<WH7230> of your traffic<WH7404> they filled<WH4390> the midst<WH8432> of you with violence,<WH2555> and you have sinned:<WH2398> therefore I have cast you as profane<WH2490> out of the mountain<WH2022> of God;<WH430> and I have destroyed<WH6> you,<WH5526> covering cherub,<WH3742> from the midst<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire.<WH784>

Your heart<WH3820> was lifted up<WH1361> because of your beauty;<WH3308> you have corrupted<WH7843> your wisdom<WH2451> by reason of<WH5921> your brightness:<WH3314> I have cast<WH7993> you to the ground;<WH776> I have laid<WH5414> you before<WH6440> kings,<WH4428> that they may see you.<WH7200>

By the multitude<WH7230> of your iniquities,<WH5771> in the unrighteousness<WH5766> of your traffic,<WH7404> you have profaned<WH2490> your sanctuaries;<WH4720> therefore have I brought forth<WH3318> a fire<WH784> from the midst<WH8432> of you;<WH398> it has devoured you,<WH5414> and I have turned you to ashes<WH665> on the earth<WH776> in the sight<WH5869> of all those who see you.<WH7200>
All those who know<WH3045> you among the peoples<WH5971> shall be astonished<WH8074> at you:<WH1091> you have become a terror, and you shall<WH369> nevermore have any being.<WH5704>
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward Sidon,<WH6721> and prophesy against it,<WH5012>

and say,<WH559> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Behold,<WH6721> I am against you, Sidon; and I will be glorified<WH3513> in the midst<WH8432> of you;<WH3045> and they shall know that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I shall have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in her,<WH6942> and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will send<WH7971> pestilence<WH1698> into her,<WH1818> and blood into her streets;<WH2351> and the wounded<WH2491> shall fall<WH5307> in the midst<WH8432> of her,<WH2719> with the sword on her on every side;<WH5439> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

There shall be no more a pricking<WH3992> brier<WH5544> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> nor a hurting<WH3510> thorn<WH6975> of any that are around<WH5439> them,<WH7590> that scorned them;<WH3045> and they shall know that I am the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> When I shall have gathered<WH6908> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> from the peoples<WH5971> among whom they are scattered,<WH6327> and shall be sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> then shall they dwell<WH3427> in their own land<WH127> which I gave<WH5414> to my servant<WH5650> Jacob.<WH3290>

They shall dwell<WH3427> securely<WH983> therein;<WH1129> yes, they shall build houses,<WH1004> and plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> and shall dwell<WH3427> securely,<WH983> when I have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on all those who do them despite<WH7590> all around<WH5439> them;<WH3045> and they shall know that I am Yahweh<WH3068> their God.<WH430>
